document.full_text: iran plans to protest to fifa over an official's decision to bar its women's national team from playing in an olympic qualifier because the players were wearing the traditional muslim head dress, the hajib.
document.title: iran protests hijab ban
lines_and_colors: iran plans to protest to fifa over an official's decision to bar its women's national team from playing in an olympic qualifier because the players were wearing the traditional muslim head dress, the hajib.
